text: @DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump You're a step ahead of your father in that at least you can spell "coronavirus," though your understanding of it is as empty-headed as his. My God, what a reprehensible and distasteful pack of yokels you people are. Common criminals. And I do mean "common."

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
